verses.verse: "Now <S%H1212>Bezalel<s%> and <S%H171>Oholiab,<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2450>skillful<s%> <S%H3820><s%> <S%H376>person<s%> in <S%H834>whom<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H2451>skill<s%> and <S%H8394>understanding<s%> to <S%H3045>know<s%> how to <S%H6213>perform<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4399>work<s%> in the <S%H5656>construction<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary,<s%> shall <S%H6213>perform<s%> in accordance with <S%H3605>all<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H6680>commanded.<s%>"

Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H1212>Bezalel<s%> and <S%H171>Oholiab<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2450>skillful<s%> <S%H3820><s%> <S%H376>person<s%> in <S%H834>whom<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H2451>skill,<s%> <S%H3605>everyone<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H5375>stirred<s%> him, to <S%H7126>come<s%> to the <S%H4399>work<s%> to <S%H6213>perform<s%> it.

And they <S%H3947>received<s%> from <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H8641>contributions<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> had <S%H935>brought<s%> to <S%H6213>perform<s%> the <S%H4399>work<s%> in the <S%H5656>construction<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary.<s%> And they <S%H5750>still<s%> [continued] <S%H935>bringing<s%> to him <S%H5071>freewill<s%> <S%H5071>offerings<s%> <S%H1242>every<s%> <S%H1242>morning.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2450>skillful<s%> <S%H2450>men<s%> who were <S%H6213>performing<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4399>work<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%> <S%H935>came,<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> from the <S%H4399>work<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he was <S%H6213>performing,<s%>

and they <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> "The <S%H5971>people<s%> are <S%H935>bringing<s%> <S%H7235>much<s%> <S%H7235>more<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H1767>enough<s%> for the <S%H5656>construction<s%> <S%H5656>work<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> [us] to <S%H6213>perform.<s%>"

So <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6680>issued<s%> a <S%H6680>command,<s%> and a <S%H6963>proclamation<s%> was <S%H5674>circulated<s%> throughout the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "Let <S%H408>neither<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H408>nor<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H5750>any<s%> <S%H5750>longer<s%> <S%H6213>perform<s%> <S%H4399>work<s%> for the <S%H8641>contributions<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary.<s%>" Thus the <S%H5971>people<s%> were <S%H3607>restrained<s%> from <S%H935>bringing<s%> [any more.]

For the <S%H4399>material<s%> they <S%H1961>had<s%> was <S%H1767>sufficient<s%> and <S%H3498>more<s%> <S%H3498>than<s%> <S%H3498>enough<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4399>work,<s%> to <S%H6213>perform<s%> it.

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2450>skillful<s%> <S%H3820><s%> <S%H2450>men<s%> <S%H3820><s%> among those who were <S%H6213>performing<s%> the <S%H4399>work<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> with <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H3407>curtains;<s%> of <S%H8336>fine<s%> <S%H7806>twisted<s%> <S%H8336>linen<s%> and <S%H8504>blue<s%> and <S%H713>purple<s%> and <S%H8144>scarlet<s%> [material,] with <S%H3742>cherubim,<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of a <S%H2803>skillful<s%> <S%H2803>workman,<s%> Bezalel <S%H6213>made<s%> them.

The <S%H753>length<s%> of <S%H259>each<s%> <S%H3407>curtain<s%> was twenty-eight <S%H520>cubits,<s%> and the <S%H7341>width<s%> of <S%H259>each<s%> <S%H3407>curtain<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H520>cubits;<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3407>curtains<s%> had the <S%H259>same<s%> <S%H4060>measurements.<s%>

And he <S%H2266>joined<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3407>curtains<s%> to <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H259>another,<s%> and [the other] <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3407>curtains<s%> he <S%H2266>joined<s%> to <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H259>another.<s%>

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H9234>loops<s%> of <S%H8504>blue<s%> on the <S%H8193>edge<s%> of the <S%H7098>outermost<s%> <S%H3407>curtain<s%> in the <S%H259>first<s%> <S%H4225>set;<s%> he <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3651>likewise<s%> on the <S%H8193>edge<s%> of the <S%H3407>curtain<s%> that was <S%H7020>outermost<s%> in the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H4225>set.<s%>

He <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H9234>loops<s%> in the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3407>curtain<s%> and he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H9234>loops<s%> on the <S%H7097>edge<s%> of the <S%H3407>curtain<s%> that was in the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H4225>set;<s%> the <S%H9234>loops<s%> were <S%H6901>opposite<s%> <S%H259>each<s%> <S%H259>other.<s%>

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H7165>clasps<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and <S%H2266>joined<s%> the <S%H3407>curtains<s%> to <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H259>another<s%> with the <S%H7165>clasps,<s%> so the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> was a <S%H259>unit.<s%>

Then he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H3407>curtains<s%> of goats' [hair] for a <S%H168>tent<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle;<s%> he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H6249>eleven<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H3407>curtains<s%> in all.

The <S%H753>length<s%> of <S%H259>each<s%> <S%H3407>curtain<s%> was <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> the <S%H7341>width<s%> of <S%H259>each<s%> <S%H3407>curtain;<s%> the <S%H6249>eleven<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H3407>curtains<s%> had the <S%H259>same<s%> <S%H4060>measurements.<s%>
And he <S%H2266>joined<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3407>curtains<s%> by <S%H905>themselves,<s%> and [the other] <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3407>curtains<s%> by <S%H905>themselves.<s%>

Moreover, he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H9234>loops<s%> on the <S%H8193>edge<s%> of the <S%H3407>curtain<s%> that was <S%H7020>outermost<s%> in the [first] <S%H4225>set,<s%> and he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H9234>loops<s%> on the <S%H8193>edge<s%> of the <S%H3407>curtain<s%> [that was outermost in] the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H2279>set.<s%>
And he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H7165>clasps<s%> of <S%H5178>bronze<s%> to <S%H2266>join<s%> the <S%H168>tent<s%> <S%H2266>together,<s%> that it might be a <S%H259>unit.<s%>

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H4372>covering<s%> for the <S%H168>tent<s%> of rams' <S%H5785>skins<s%> <S%H119>dyed<s%> <S%H119>red,<s%> and a <S%H4372>covering<s%> of <S%H8476>porpoise<s%> <S%H5785>skins<s%> <S%H4480>above.<s%> <S%H4605><s%>
Then he <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H7175>boards<s%> for the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6086>wood,<s%> <S%H5975>standing<s%> <S%H5975>upright.<s%>

<S%H6235>Ten<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> was the <S%H753>length<s%> of each <S%H7175>board,<s%> and one and a <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> the <S%H7341>width<s%> of <S%H259>each<s%> <S%H7175>board.<s%>

There were <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3027>tenons<s%> for <S%H259>each<s%> <S%H7175>board,<s%> <S%H7947>fitted<s%> to <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H259>another;<s%> <S%H3651>thus<s%> he <S%H6213>did<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7175>boards<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle.<s%>
And he <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H7175>boards<s%> for the <S%H4908>tabernacle:<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H7175>boards<s%> for the <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H8486><s%> <S%H6285>side;<s%>

and he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H7175>boards;<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7175>board<s%> for its <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3027>tenons<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H7175>board<s%> for its <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3027>tenons.<s%>
Then for the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H6763>side<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%> on the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H6285>side,<s%> he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H7175>boards,<s%>

and their <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> of <S%H3701>silver;<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7175>board<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H7175>board.<s%>
And for the <S%H3411>rear<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%> to the <S%H3220>west,<s%> he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H7175>boards.<s%>
And he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7175>boards<s%> for the <S%H4740>corners<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> at the <S%H3411>rear.<s%>

And they were <S%H8382>double<s%> <S%H4295>beneath,<s%> and <S%H9191>together<s%> they were <S%H8535>complete<s%> to its <S%H7218>top<s%> to the <S%H259>first<s%> <S%H2885>ring;<s%> <S%H3651>thus<s%> he <S%H6213>did<s%> with <S%H8147>both<s%> of them for the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4740>corners.<s%>

And there were <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H7175>boards<s%> with their <S%H134>sockets<s%> of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> <S%H8337>sixteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H134>sockets,<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> <S%H259>every<s%> <S%H7175>board.<s%>

Then he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H1280>bars<s%> of <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6086>wood,<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> for the <S%H7175>boards<s%> of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6763>side<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%>

and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H1280>bars<s%> for the <S%H7175>boards<s%> of the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H6763>side<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H1280>bars<s%> for the <S%H7175>boards<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> for the <S%H3411>rear<s%> [side] to the <S%H3220>west.<s%>

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H8484>middle<s%> <S%H1280>bar<s%> to <S%H1272>pass<s%> <S%H1272>through<s%> in the <S%H8432>center<s%> of the <S%H7175>boards<s%> from <S%H7097>end<s%> to <S%H7097>end.<s%>

And he <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> the <S%H7175>boards<s%> with <S%H2091>gold<s%> and <S%H6213>made<s%> their <S%H2885>rings<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> [as] <S%H1004>holders<s%> for the <S%H1280>bars,<s%> and <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> the <S%H1280>bars<s%> with <S%H2091>gold.<s%>

Moreover, he <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H6532>veil<s%> of <S%H8504>blue<s%> and <S%H713>purple<s%> and <S%H8144>scarlet<s%> [material,] and <S%H8336>fine<s%> <S%H7806>twisted<s%> <S%H8336>linen;<s%> he <S%H6213>made<s%> it with <S%H3742>cherubim,<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of a <S%H2803>skillful<s%> <S%H2803>workman.<s%>

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H5982>pillars<s%> of <S%H7848>acacia<s%> for it, and <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> them with <S%H2091>gold,<s%> with their <S%H2053>hooks<s%> of <S%H2091>gold;<s%> and he <S%H3332>cast<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%> for them.

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H4539>screen<s%> for the <S%H6607>doorway<s%> of the <S%H168>tent,<s%> of <S%H8504>blue<s%> and <S%H713>purple<s%> and <S%H8144>scarlet<s%> [material,] and <S%H8336>fine<s%> <S%H7806>twisted<s%> <S%H8336>linen,<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of a <S%H7551>weaver;<s%>

and [he made] its <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H5982>pillars<s%> with their <S%H2053>hooks,<s%> and he <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> their <S%H7218>tops<s%> and their <S%H2838>bands<s%> with <S%H2091>gold;<s%> but their <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> were of <S%H5178>bronze.<s%>
